title: Utaou, Inda suru hodo no Yorokobi wo
description:
1. Houkago Jigokumeguri
2. Kimi to Boku no Netsuryou Hozon
3. Hikari no Densetsu (Yami)
4. King Maker
5. Shikima no Yama
6. Tekubi ni Honno, Sukoshi dake (Just a Small Tad on the Wrists)
7-8. Bouryokudan Onsen Geisha
9. Hitoshizuku, Bowl kara Koborete
10-11. Fusuma
12. Location-Han
